body.name: Camping Fan with LED Lantern, 10400mAh 9-Inch Rechargeable Outdoor Tent Fan, 270°Head Rotation, Stepless Speed and Quiet Battery Operated USB Fan for Picnic, Barbecue, Fishing, Travel
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: 【10400mAh Capacity Battery】- Different from other low-quality products on the market, The camping fan built-in a 10400mAh rechargeable battery, which can work continuously for 8-36 hours, bringing you more lasting coolness. In addition, it also supports working while charging, and does not generate heat during use, which is also safe for children.

【Quiet but Powerful Wind】- The tent fan adopts lastest brushless motor technology and high-performance ultra-thin fan blades, which can provides you with ultra-strong airflow at the lowest noise ( <30db), maintaining air circulation in the tent. It will not affect your sleep or do anything.

【Super Bright LED Camping Lantern】- The portable fan has 3 brightness settings. The lowest brightness can emit a soft and non-glaring light, and the maximum brightness can illuminate the entire tent. It is an ideal light source for camping or hiking at night. In addition, the tent light fan has a hook design that can be easily hung on the top of the tent, saving space.

【Professional Camping Gear】- The overall size is small and exquisite, you can easily put it in your backpack when you are not using it, it will not bring you extra burden. It uses USB charging, which means you can connect it to your power bank, laptop or car power supply for charging. Supports 2A fast charging and only needs 6 hours to fully charge. It is an ideal companion for camping, fishing, and hiking!

【Sturdy & Anti-drop】- 2 in 1 travel tent fan housing is made of sturdy and durable ABS material, which can prevent violent impact, so you can confidently use it in various outdoor occasions. In addition, it is also suitable for indoor use as a desk fan. The cool punk style appearance makes it a beautiful artwork on your desktop at the same time.

30db Low Noise LED Night Light Portable & Lightweight

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact design and lightweight build
reviews.reviewText: This portable camping fan has been a game-changer for my outdoor adventures. Its compact design and lightweight build make it easy to carry, while the integrated LED lights provide versatile illumination during camping nights. The fan's adjustable settings ensure a refreshing breeze, helping combat the heat in warmer climates. The durable construction stands up to the rigors of outdoor use, and the battery life is impressive. This fan has become a must-have for my camping trips, offering a perfect blend of functionality and convenience to enhance the overall outdoor experience. Highly recommended for fellow campers seeking a reliable and versatile camping companion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable and Just Right
reviews.reviewText: This is good fan to have when the electricity goes out. Keeps charged for a long time. For a little fan it keeps a good amount of air blowing. Not loud at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought the same fan/light nearly three years ago and it still works great! I had looked for another one and couldn’t find it so imagine my delight to pull the twin out of the Amazon box! Highly recommend especially if you are off grid or need backup in a storm!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I Want A Jet Turbine Blowing In My Face
reviews.reviewText: Anything short of an industrial fan with the power to create tornadoes is too weak for me. I run hot and have a fan on my nightstand blowing directly onto my face. I bought this fan for when I set up a table for my job and have to sit outside in the SoCal sun. It works, the light is good, and the battery lasts a decent while. It lasts anywhere from 4-8 hours on a single charge, which is plenty for me. I only wish it were a little more powerful. I have it blowing at 100% whenever I use it, and I keep it within 5 ft of my face. Anything beyond that is unnoticeable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Met or Exceeded Manufacturer's Claims - great fan for travel!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this fan for a 13,500 mile trip to Alaska, Texas and back to NC this past August. The seller said that, when fully-charged it should last about 8 hours on high and over 30 hours on low. The speed is variable I used this fan on medium for two full nights during my first few days out - without recharging. I did that again later in the trip. I would normally charge it (USB) while driving during the day and then use it every night. It NEVER died on me - not once. It performed at least as well as the seller's claims, ran quietly, and moved enough air to keep the closed van comfortable on warm August nights! The built in light (3-level) also came in extremely handy when I had to get out of the van at night. Well worth the money. I am so pleasantly surprised that I plan to buy another one just to have around...Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s an ok fan for camping and emergency use after a hurricane or other natural disaster
reviews.reviewText: This fan is just adequate, it doesn’t blow a strong breeze, but it’s rechargeable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars An Ok Fan with a major flaw
reviews.reviewText: I bought this fan to be used daily at my work station to use when the AC is off, being battery powered I can use my solar setup to recharge without using house power and it's a good size and pushes a good amount of air, that is until it doesn't. I don't know if this is normal or not, but between 20 minutes and 45 minutes of use, the fan will kick itself out of "high" the knob turned to the highest setting. You then have to turn it off and then back off again and it goes back into "high". Maybe not a big deal for me since it's sitting right next to me, but for people that are going to use this while they sleep, this could be an issue as the air flow is significant enough to be noticeable. If it wasn't for this, it would be a 5 star fan because everything else is fine, battery life, the light, the weight, build quality, it's just that one issue that brings it down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little fan
reviews.reviewText: I use this in our RV. It's a great fan. It's very quiet. The light is very bright! I love that you can adjust the angle too.
